name: Cosmic Flighters!
description:
THE COSMIC FLIGHTERS' ARE GO!

Cosmic Flighters! is a free, 2D platforming-shooter title following a trio of intergalactic pigeons on a quest to reclaim their stolen bread from their evil nemesis, Sir Budge G. Rigar!

Platform your way through Rigar's grim castle as you switch simultaneously between the pigeons and use their unique abilities (and weaponry!) to overcome different obstacles.  Will you be able to help the Flighters locate their bread in time? And what's Sir Budge G. Rigar planning behind the scenes...?

_______________________

Features:

  • A single-player adventure with cartoony pixel art aesthetics and a witty narrative
  • Ten platforming levels with increasing difficulty 
  • Seven collectable feathers hidden throughout the levels
  • Switch among two playable characters at all times during gameplay
  • Find and swap between powerful Weapons to gun down your enemies 
  • The Cosmic Flighters' humorous interactions through scripted dialogue
  • Bread (?)

_______________________

Information:

Price: Free
Release date: 23/06/2022
Developed by: EWB-0461 (Eloise)

Cosmic Flighters! is my first time completing an entire project in GameMaker, and I'm very happy (and surprised) with its outcome! Thank you for your interest in my wacky game, and I look forward to improving my skills in future game development.

Contact:  eloise.butler@mds.ac.nz
